product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Headset, Micro USB Charger, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty for In-box Accessories Including Batteries from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: Customer Can Call at 18001028169 for Customer Support for Further Information and For Damage/Repair Services Customer can Visit to Nearest Services Sentre

product_description.FM Radio and MP3 Player: While its MP3 player helps you listen to your favourite tracks, its wireless FM radio keeps you entertained with the latest news and tracks even when you’re on the move. Also, the dual front-facing speakers and dedicated music buttons enhance your entertainment experience.
product_description.Design: With its smooth curves, easy-to-use buttons and a comfortable grip, this phone’s classic design makes it your ideal device.
product_description.Designed for Music Lovers: Its clear, curved display helps you view the screen to see what’s playing quickly. Also, the dedicated music buttons help you change tracks with ease.
product_description.Battery: Its long-lasting battery keeps you entertained for long hours after a single, full charge. It runs for days in the standby mode and you can talk for hours, even when the phone is not charged fully.

Never buy this or any other electronic device from Flipkart. I have got this in June 2021, used for 2 weeks but after that some noise came out from phone. Couldn’t stop it anyways other than switching off the phone. Flipkart has no guarantee for phones after 7 days and so I had to contact Nokia. They only send some automated emails saying they have created a ticket for this issue, but when again contacting them to follow up they’ll create another ticket so going back to square one each time we contact them. One guy told they’ll arrange pickup for this item from my house and will then send a replacement. But the next time we follow up with them, they will again create a ticket for the issue. So I have used this phone only 2 weeks and then it’s gone. Still waiting to get a response from Nokia or Flipkart. Very disappointed!
